newsArray.title: ‘Concussed’ Shanaka in trouble as SLC initiates inquiry against him
creator: PTI
newsArray.description: Colombo, Feb 11 (PTI) All-rounder Dasun Shanaka landed in trouble after Sri Lanka Cricket (SLC) decided to initiate an inquiry against him for allegedly faking concussion to skip a domestic match to play for Dubai Capitals in the ILT20. Shanaka, a former white ball formats captain of Sri Lanka, left Sinhalese Sports Club’s three-day match [...]

newsArray.title: Cricket-Bangladesh's Akhter gets five-year ban for anti-corruption code breaches
newsArray.description: (Reuters) - Bangladesh women's player Shohely Akhter has been banned from all cricket for five years after the spinner was found guilty of breaching the International Cricket Council's (ICC) anti-corruption code, the sport's governing body said on Tuesday. Read full story

newsArray.title: Ranji Trophy 2024-25: Motivated Rahane says, “cricket left in me” after leading Mumbai to semifinal
newsArray.description: The 36-year-old batter scored his 41st First-Class century to give his side a 353-run lead, which eventually was good enough to keep Mumbai’s pursuit of a successive red-ball title and a domestic treble intact.

newsArray.title: IND vs ENG, 3rd ODI: India looks to iron out chinks ahead of Champions Trophy in dead rubber against England
newsArray.description: Middle-order collapses in the first two ODIs denied India lopsided victories which were well warranted after Shubman Gill’s 96-ball 87 in Nagpur and Rohit Sharma’s century in Cuttack.

newsArray.title: शतक लगाने के 48 घंटे के बाद क्यों रो दिए रोहित, कप्तान क्यों परेशान ?
creator: News18 Hindi
newsArray.description: अहमदाबाद शहर और यहां पर हुई घटना को रोहित शर्मा आज तक नहीं भूल पाए है. साल 2023 में वर्ल्ड कप के फाइनल में मिली हार भारतीय कप्तान को लगातार टीस देती रहती है लगभग दो साल के बाद वनडे खेलने पहुंचे रोहित को आज भी वो दिन याद रहता है जब उनकी आंख के सामने ऑस्ट्रेलिया ट्रॉफी ले उड़ी थी. हलांकि बतौर बल्लेबाज वो उस फाइनल को याद कर सकते है क्योंकि पहले 10 ओवर में रोहित ने कंगारु गेंदबाजों की जमकर पिटाई की थी.
newsArray.ai_tag: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS
newsArray.sentiment: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS
newsArray.sentiment_stats: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS

newsArray.title: Chelsea Co-owner Todd Boehly Purchases 49 Percent Stake In Hundred Franchise Trent Rockets
creator: News18
newsArray.description: Nottinghamshire, hosts of the Rockets at their Trent Bridge ground, will retain control of the other 51%.

newsArray.description: It tests the true character of a person and cricketer; whenever you hear the legends speak, they rate First Class cricket so highly because of that

newsArray.title: Sheldon Jackson announced retirement from all format of cricket after 15 year of career ms dhoni
creator: Saurav Kumar
newsArray.description: सौराष्ट्र के स्टार विकेटकीपर बल्लेबाज शेल्डन जैक्सन ने अचानक संन्यास का ऐलान कर सबको चौंका दिया है. The post Sheldon Jackson announced retirement from all format of cricket after 15 year of career ms dhoni appeared first on Cricket Country.

newsArray.title: Rahane century, Dias five-wicket burst put Mumbai in Ranji Trophy semifinal
creator: PTI
newsArray.description: Kolkata, Feb 11 (PTI) Skipper Ajinkya Rahane conjured a typically gritty hundred and pacer Royston Dias supported his effort with a five-wicket haul as defending champions Mumbai completed a fine escape act, scripting a commanding 152-run win over Haryana to enter the Ranji Trophy semifinals here on Tuesday. Rahane, resuming on 88, wasted no time [...]
